# InteractiveConsole.ReadKey method

Calls the [`InteractiveConsole`](../InteractiveConsole.md)'s buffer to it's [`ISystemConsole`](../ISystemConsole.md)'s [`ReadKey`](../ISystemConsole/ReadKey.md) method.
